New Records: Fakhar Zaman (4990) needs ten runs to complete the landmark of 5000 runs in international cricket.
Mitchell Santner (246) requires four scalps to get to 250 wickets across formats.
Trent Boult (598) needs two wickets to reach 600 scalps in international cricket.
Kyle Jamieson (96) needs four scalps to reach 100 wickets in international matches.
Tom Latham (3948) requires 52 runs to complete the milestone of 4000 runs in ODI cricket.
James Neesham (94) is six sixes away from completing 100 maximums across formats.
Hasan Ali (99) is one scalp away from reaching 100 wickets in one-day internationals.
Pre-Game Insights: The BlackCaps won their opening four encounters but are now on a mini-slump while Pakistan has three victories in seven outings so far.
It has become a must-win game for the BlackCaps especially with Pakistan and Afghanistan just behind them and knocking on the door for a place in the final four.
Babar Azam and his men finally returned to winning ways when they defeated Bangladesh last time out.
